Get In Touch

There are several ways you can get in touch with me. Here are my prefered methods for communication.

Email: j @ jshamsul.com

If you would like to send me secure encrypted email messages, use this public key.

I reply to messages send to that address. I also broadcast using that address from time to time. Subscribe if you like.

Twitter: @jibone

Just send me and @ replay. I will follow you if you need to send me direct messages.
